summary.span: 派生自此抽象基类的类可定义几何形状。

span.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

summary.span: 对象可用于剪辑、命中测试以及呈现二维图形数据。

span.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相对于形状的几何图形Geometry Compared to Shape 类具有、和 其派生类缺少的其他呈现属性。The class has a , , and other rendering properties that and its derived classes lack. 类是 ，因此参与布局系统; 其派生类可用作支持子级的任何元素的内容 。The class is a and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports children. 另一方面，类只定义形状的几何图形，而不能呈现自身。The class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself. 由于其简易性，其使用范围更广。Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses. **冻结功能：** 由于该类继承自 类，因此 该类提供若干特殊功能： 对象可以声明为[资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as [resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources), shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关对象提供的不同功能的详细信息 ，请参阅可[冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).

para.span: 尽管此类是抽象的，但它不是公开可扩展的。

span.span: Although this class is abstract, it is not publicly extensible.
Geometries Sample

summary.span: 创建 的可修改克隆，以制作该对象值的深层副本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the , making deep copies of the object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本 。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 使用指定的 合并两个几何图形，并对生成的几何图形应用指定的转换。

span.span: Combines the two geometries using the specified and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.

returns.span: 合并后的几何图形。

span.span: The combined geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用 ) 组合几何图形时属性所描述 (默认公差因子。This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the property) when combining geometries. 若要指定您自己的公差因子，请使用 方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 某些 方法 (如 ) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差系数指定此多边形近似中点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的公差值生成的近似值更好，但需要的处理能力比具有大公差系数的近似值要多。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用执行 union 时应谨慎考虑， 因为这可能会占用大量的 CPU 资源。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下， 或的 工作效果更佳。In most cases, a or will work better. 仅当下列任一条件适用时才使用：Use only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中的一个几何图形的 值为 ，而几何图形是自相交的 (也就是说， 实际) 。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间不是问题，但如果创建了一次几何，然后缓存了) ，则 (的空间。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常， 生成的输出小于 。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 生成的几何图形将在路径动画中描边或使用，并且不会 提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

span.span: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.
If is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.

span.span: Combines the two geometries using the specified and tolerance factor, and applies the specified transform to the resulting geometry.

returns.span: 合并后的几何图形。

span.span: The combined geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 方法 (如 ) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差系数指定此多边形近似中点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的公差值生成的近似值更好，但需要的处理能力比具有大公差系数的近似值要多。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用执行 union 时应谨慎考虑， 因为这可能会占用大量的 CPU 资源。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大多数情况下， 或的 工作效果更佳。In most cases, a or will work better. 仅当下列任一条件适用时才使用：Use only when any of the following apply: - 几何操作不是联合。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中的一个几何图形的 值为 ，而几何图形是自相交的 (也就是说， 实际) 。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 时间不是问题，但如果创建了一次几何，然后缓存了) ，则 (的空间。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常， 生成的输出小于 。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 生成的几何图形将在路径动画中描边或使用，并且不会 提供所需的轮廓。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 方法 (如 ) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差系数指定此多边形近似中点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的公差值生成的近似值更好，但需要的处理能力比具有大公差系数的近似值要多。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当确定指定点是否位于几何图形的笔画中时，将使用属性) 指定 (默认公差因子。The default tolerance factor (specified by the property) is used when determining whether the specified point is located in the geometry's stroke. 若要指定您自己的公差因子，请使用 重载。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the overload. 某些 方法 (如 ) 生成或使用几何图形的多边形近似。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容差系数指定此多边形近似中点之间的最大距离。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 较小的公差值生成的近似值更好，但需要的处理能力比具有大公差系数的近似值要多。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前对象没有转换值，则此方法返回标识转换。This method returns the identity transformation if the current object has no transformation value. 否则，它返回 应用于当前对象的。Otherwise, it returns the applied to the current object. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性将应用于 对象。The following example shows how to use the property to apply a to a object. 该示例使用 从三个对象创建复合形状 ，然后使用属性旋转几何45度 。The example uses a to create a composite shape from three objects and then rotates the geometry 45 degrees by using the property. [!code-xaml[Transforms_snip#GeometryTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Transforms_snip/CS/GeometryTransformExample.xaml#geometrytransformexamplewholepage)]

span.span: 2-D Transforms Sample
